nodes.text: The Model 3 Autorepair Suite was a model of self-repair system, a type of armor modification. The modification was manufactured by Industrial Automaton and was available during the Galactic Civil War for 3000 credits.
The Model 3 Autorepair Suite was introduced in Special Modifications, a 2016 roleplaying supplement for Star Wars: Age of Rebellion which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
